Posts.Content: Apr 29, 2009 02:59PM katpierini wrote: Trish, I know how terrifying the wait is, I went through it 2 months ago, the lomgest few days ever. I was so pessimistic and almost certain that it was cancer and that it had spread everywhere. I had pain in my ribs, shoulders and groin lymph nodes. I was so very luck to be benign and I wish you the same. Should you not be, this is the place to be. I am still coming here, to remind myself how many women are dealing with this and how great the support is. Hugs
Posts.Title: Had my biopsy this morning TFrye mkenglish
